targets.expr:
# Fallback to sysUpTime if linkmon_switch_uptime isn't present for the switch
$__to - ((linkmon_switch_uptime{switch=~"$switch"}*1000) or on () (sysUpTime{switch_id="$switch"}*10))

# Fallback to sysUpTime if linkmon_switch_uptime isn't present for the switch
linkmon_switch_uptime{switch=~"$switch"} or on () (sysUpTime{switch_id="$switch"}/100)

panels.description: In the past five minutes, ports that have not been up at all.
panels.title: Ports Down

targets.expr:
sum by (switch_id, ifName) (( (changes(ifLastChange{switch_id=~"$switch"}[$__range])>0) ) or
        on (switch_id, ifName)(  (label_replace(label_replace(
            (changes(linkmon_switch_carrier_changes{switch=~"$switch"}[$__range]) > 0),
            "ifName", "$1", "port", "(.*)"),
            "switch_id", "$1", "switch", "(.*)"))))

panels.description: Description of the remote endpoints connected to each of the switch's ports.
panels.title: Connections
